001package edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.hilt;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import androidx.room.Room;
005import dagger.Module;
006import dagger.Provides;
007import dagger.hilt.InstallIn;
008import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ApplicationContext;
009import dagger.hilt.components.SingletonComponent;
010import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.model.dao.UserDao;
011import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.service.LocalDatabase;
012import javax.inject.Singleton;
013
014/**
015 * Uses Dagger {@link Provides @Provides}-annotated methods to satisfy dependencies on concrete
016 * implementations of {@link LocalDatabase} and {@link UserDao}.
017 */
018@InstallIn(SingletonComponent.class)
019@Module
020public final class DatabaseModule {
021
022  DatabaseModule() {
023    // Package-private constructor to avoid automatic HTML documentation generation.
024  }
025
026  @Provides
027  @Singleton
028  LocalDatabase provideLocalDatabase(@ApplicationContext Context context) {
029    return Room
030        .databaseBuilder(context, LocalDatabase.class, LocalDatabase.NAME)
031        .addCallback(new LocalDatabase.Callback())
032        .build();
033  }
034
035  @Provides
036  UserDao provideUserDao(LocalDatabase database) {
037    return database.getUserDao();
038  }
039
040  // TODO Add additional methods so satisfy dependencies on other DAO interface implementations.
041
042}
